summary: The repository provides the Instructor library, a Python toolkit built on Pydantic that simplifies extracting structured data from large language models. It includes command‑line utilities for automatically generating front‑matter metadata for content files and for creating a documentation sitemap by extracting and optionally summarizing page contents, both leveraging the OpenAI API with asynchronous processing and Rich progress reporting.
business_intent: Help developers automate content enrichment and site navigation generation, improving documentation organization, discoverability, and SEO by using LLMs to produce structured metadata and sitemaps.
